sources.name: Remotive
sources.notes: Deduplicates API snapshot with RSS feed; runs 4x/day via workflow.

sources.name: Remote OK
sources.notes: Fetches https://remoteok.com/rss every run; dedupe on guid/link.

sources.name: We Work Remotely (Programming)
sources.notes: Fetches programming feed and splits company from title.

sources.name: Jobspresso (Developer)
sources.blockers: Needs dedupe strategy and feed reliability checks.
sources.proposedSolution: Add RSS fetch from https://jobspresso.co/remote-work/job-category/developer/?feed=rss2 when ready.

sources.name: Remote.co (Developer)
sources.blockers: Cloudflare managed challenge prevents automated fetches.
sources.proposedSolution: Request API access or whitelisted IP; fallback to browser-based scraper.

sources.name: NoDesk
sources.proposedSolution: Construct HTML scraper or obtain direct export.

sources.name: Working Nomads
sources.blockers: Feed removed; API access appears gated.
sources.proposedSolution: Contact provider for API credentials or switch sources.

sources.name: Himalayas
sources.blockers: Cloudflare challenge for both API and RSS.
sources.proposedSolution: Obtain official API token or whitelisted route.

workflow.summary: Each execution fetches all active sources, batch-upserts via RPCs, and marks missing jobs.
